page.prototype: .merge as c (source_text as C, regex_pattern as C [, format as C [, options as C]])

argument.name: source_text
argument.description: Source text to run merge against

page.example:
dim re as extension::Regex
? re.merge("20 apples and 10 oranges","([a-z]+)") = "20 10 "
? re.merge("20 apples and 10 oranges","([a-z]+)","{}") = "20 {} {} 10 {}"
